resources.string: Please capture a clean and well-light image of your receipt(towards the center)
Couldn\'t connect to camera; encountered an error
It seems your camera permission for is disabled, please allow our request or manually enable it in settings
Are you sure you want to delete
Add Shopping List User Item Activity
Can\'t Use Save Microphone Feature Without Granted Record Audio Permission
Select a store from below, all your recorded purchase details will be stored in that its history
You have not currently selected a store(main page), please select what store you would like to save %s in below
Couldn\'t recognize %s as a numeric value
Couldn\'t recognize %s as a measurement of weight
Error in processing input, enter proper numeric value such as 1.0
Error in processing input, enter proper numeric/weight values
Please record your customary or metric measurement of weight, such as pounds or kilograms, as you have weight toggled in quantity details
Please only record numeric values such as \'three\'(3), as you have \'each\' toggled in quantity details
Enter a proper unit of weight
Please add a proper unit of weight after your numeric value \'%s\'
Additional weight detail despite must have proper weight unit(e.g. lb)
Please only enter stand alone numeric values like \'three(3)\' for quantity
%s purchased from %s on %s for unit price of %f(unit price is averaged if more than one purchase under same day)
Quantity Value has to be greater than 0
Unit price value has to be greater than 0
Price per pound or preferred unit
Set Weight Unit for Price Comparison
Select a unit of weight to compare item prices\\nCurrent: %s
"Find store or date specific item purchase "
Unit Price *(with /Unit - per lb, oz, kg, etc)
For by weight items, only numeric values such as 1.0 are needed in the quantity feild
By weight item unit price needs to have a measurement unit such as \'per pound/lb\'
Couldn\'t recognize %s as unit price with proper measurement unit
Unit Price is required to record purchase details for an item sold BY WEIGHT
%s is not a proper numeric value
Bought item quantity cannot be changed
Package Price is required to record purchase details for an item sold BY PACKAGE
Only Number value greater than zero followed by -/lb,/kg,/g,/fl oz,/oz,/pt,/gl,/ml,/l allowed to be entered

Sorry ,couldn\'t recognize voice input. Please add .0 in the end for whole number voice input.Example, for 2 /lb to be recorded, you can say two point zero per pound. You can provide Unit Price in following units - /lb,/kg,/g,/fl oz,/oz,/pt,/gl,/ml,/l . You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded.
Only Number value greater than zero followed by -/lb,/kg,/g,/fl oz,/oz,/pt,/gl,/ml,/l allowed to be entered in Unit Price

Sorry, couldn't recognize voice input.

Please add .0 in the end for whole number(1,2,3,..etc) voice input. Example, for 2 , say two point zero. 

Only number value greater than zero allowed. You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded.
Only number value greater than zero allowed to be entered for the Package Price
"Only whole Number(1,2,3,...etc) allowed to be entered for Total Packages Purchased field"

" Sorry ,couldn't recognize voice input.Please add .0 in the end for whole number(1,2,3...etc) voice input. Example, for 2 , say two point zero. Only whole numbers allowed. You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded."

Sorry, couldn\'t recognize voice input. Please add .0 in the end for whole number voice input.Example, for 2 lb to be recorded, you can say two point zero pound. You can provide Unit Price in following units - lb,kg,g,fl oz,oz,pt,gl,ml,l . You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded.
Only whole Number(1,2,3,...etc) allowed to be entered for Item Count in Package field

Sorry, couldn\'t recognize voice input.Please add .0 in the end for whole number(1,2,3...etc) voice input. Example, for 2 , say two point zero. Only whole numbers allowed. You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded.
Only whole numbers (1,2,3,...etc) allowed to be entered for within package item count
Only Number value greater than zero allowed to be entered

Sorry, couldn\'t recognize voice input.Please add .0 in the end for whole number(1,2,3...etc) voice input. Example, for 2 , say two point zero. Only whole numbers allowed. You can always make manual entry or edit entry recorded.
Only Number value greater than zero followed by -lb,kg,g,fl oz,oz,pt,gl,ml,l allowed to be entered for Package Weight field
Please note that item name change will not update item name in shopping list or Store Purchase History. \nRemove item from shopping list and add it from item repository to see the name change.
